title: Use Keycloak Admin Client in Keycloak testcontainers got  NoClassDefFoundError
body:
### Describe the bug

I create customized testcontainers for keycloak, like flow code, but when i  call getKeycloakAdminClient method got error.

```java
public class KeycloakContainer extends GenericContainer<KeycloakContainer> {
    ...some other method

     public Keycloak getKeycloakAdminClient() {
        if (useTls) {
            return Keycloak.getInstance(getAuthServerUrl(), MASTER_REALM, getAdminUsername(), getAdminPassword(), ADMIN_CLI_CLIENT, buildSslContext());
        } else {
            return Keycloak.getInstance(getAuthServerUrl(), MASTER_REALM, getAdminUsername(), getAdminPassword(), ADMIN_CLI_CLIENT);
        }
    }
}
```
```java
@Slf4j
public class KeycloakTestResource implements QuarkusTestResourceLifecycleManager {

    private static KeycloakContainer container;

    @Override
    public Map<String, String> start() {
        LOGGER.info("Start bootstrap Keycloak container.");
        container = create();
        container.start();
        adminClient = container.getKeycloakAdminClient();   // got errror in here
        LOGGER.info("Keycloak container started.");
        return genConfig();
    }

    ...some other method
}
```

```gradle
dependencies {
    api "com.qwlabs.doraemon:lang"
    api "com.qwlabs.doraemon:quarkus-test"
    api "com.qwlabs.doraemon:quarkus-test-resources"
    api "io.quarkus:quarkus-junit5-internal"
    api "io.quarkus:quarkus-junit5-properties"
    api "io.quarkus:quarkus-junit5-mockito"
    api "io.rest-assured:rest-assured"
    api "io.quarkus:quarkus-keycloak-admin-client"
    api "io.quarkus:quarkus-keycloak-admin-client-reactive"
    api "io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-reactive-jackson"
    api "org.jboss.resteasy:resteasy-client"
    api "org.keycloak:keycloak-admin-client-jakarta"
}
```

### Expected behavior

keycloak testcontainers started without error.

### Actual behavior

got error: Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/keycloak/admin/client/JacksonProvider

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin Kernel Version 22.2.0: Fri Nov 11 02:08:47 PST 2022; root:xnu-8792.61.2~4/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

openjdk version "17.0.5" 2022-10-18

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.0.0.Alpha3

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 7.6

### Additional information

_No response_
